settings.title: Settings

basic.title: Basic Rules
basic.description: Players control paddles to hit the ball back and forth. The goal is to make the ball pass your opponent's paddle.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.description: A point is scored when the ball passes the opponent's paddle. The first player to reach 11 points wins the game.

start.question: How do I start playing?
start.answer: To start playing, create an account and log in. Then you can join a game or create your own tournament.

tournaments.question: How do tournaments work?
tournaments.answer: Tournaments are organized in brackets. Players compete in matches, and winners advance to the next round until a champion is crowned.
